mapper.select: select * from user where user_email=#{user_email} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
mapper.insert: insert into user(user_email, user_pw, user_name, user_phone, user_address) values(#{user_email}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_phone}, #{user_address})
mapper.update: update user set user_pw = #{user_pw}, user_name=#{user_name}, user_phone=#{user_phone}, user_address=#{user_address} where user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.delete: delete from user where user_email = #{user_email} and user_pw = #{user_pw}
